pkgmetadata.longdescription: Multiple Class Area under ROC Curve // (nothing but) an S4 implementation of Eq. (3) and Eq. (7) by David J. Hand and Robert J. Till (2001). A Simple Generalisation of the Area Under the ROC Curve for Multiple Class Classification Problems. Machine Learning, 45 (2), p. 171--186. DOI:10.1023/A:1010920819831.
